item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, March 27, 2025 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Blender releases their Oscar winning version tool (72 points | 10 comments)
2. OpenAI adds MCP support to Agents SDK (415 points | 141 comments)
3. Debian bookworm live images now reproducible (437 points | 91 comments)
4. The Mysterious Flow of Fluid in the Brain (14 points | 6 comments)
5. A love letter to the CSV format (320 points | 315 comments)
6. Building a Linux Container Runtime from Scratch (58 points | 4 comments)
7. Botswana Successfully Launches First Satellite, Botsat-1 (206 points | 75 comments)
8. Good-bye core types; Hello Go as we know and love it (226 points | 124 comments)
9. Problems with the heap (99 points | 21 comments)
10. Building a Firecracker-Powered Course Platform to Learn Docker and Kubernetes (58 points | 5 comments)
11. Writing a tiny undo/redo stack in JavaScript (59 points | 18 comments)
12. MCP server for Ghidra (200 points | 24 comments)
13. Oracle customers confirm data stolen in alleged cloud breach is valid (177 points | 41 comments)
14. Gemma3 Function Calling (105 points | 13 comments)
15. Writing Programs with Ncurses (62 points | 12 comments)
16. NotaGen: Symbolic Music Generation (36 points | 5 comments)
17. Malware found on NPM infecting local package with reverse shell (166 points | 102 comments)
18. Cregit-Linux: how code gets into the kernel (4 points | 2 comments)
19. 'Naive' science fan faces jail for plutonium import (133 points | 82 comments)
20. Has the decline of knowledge work begun? (116 points | 167 comments)
21. Weave (YC W25) is hiring a founding product engineer ( | hide)
22. Sharding Pgvector (64 points | 7 comments)
23. How to Delete Your 23andMe Data (145 points | 78 comments)
24. Heap-overflowing Llama.cpp to RCE (230 points | 50 comments)
25. Collapse OS (133 points | 124 comments)
26. A glitch in an online survey replaced the word 'yes' with 'forks' (137 points | 64 comments)
27. The long-awaited Friend Compound laws in California (76 points | 125 comments)
28. Kilo Code: Speedrunning open source coding AI (77 points | 43 comments)
29. Playwright Tools for MCP (128 points | 24 comments)
30. Federal Government Detains International Student at Tufts (23 points | 14 comments)
